title: CREB1 promotes cholangiocarcinoma metastasis through transcriptional regulation of the LAYN-mediated TLN1/β1 integrin axis: CREB1 promotes cholangiocarcinoma metastasis through regulating LAYN/TLN1/β1 integrin axis
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17
